org.csstudio.platform.internal.simpledal.dal
Class DalConnector

java.lang.Object
  org.csstudio.platform.internal.simpledal.AbstractConnector
      org.csstudio.platform.internal.simpledal.dal.DalConnector
All Implemented Interfaces:
PropertyChangeListener, EventListener, IControlSystemItem, IProcessVariable, IProcessVariableAdressProvider, IConnector, org.eclipse.core.runtime.IAdaptable, org.epics.css.dal.context.LinkListener, org.epics.css.dal.DynamicValueListener, org.epics.css.dal.ResponseListener
public final class DalConnector
extends AbstractConnector
implements org.epics.css.dal.DynamicValueListener, org.epics.css.dal.context.LinkListener, org.epics.css.dal.ResponseListener, PropertyChangeListener

DAL Connectors are connected to the control system via the DAL API. All events received from DAL are forwarded to IProcessVariableValueListeners which abstract from DAL. For convenience the IProcessVariableValueListeners are only weakly referenced. The connector tracks for IProcessVariableValueListeners that have been garbage collected and removes those references from its internal list. This way IProcessVariableValueListeners donï¿½t have to be disposed explicitly.

Author:
Sven Wende
